description.narrative: (Zambia): The Time to Learn (TTL) project will continue to assist the Ministry of Education (MOE) to improve reading outcomes in community schools in six target provinces in the following areas:-Policy development for the community school sector-Teacher training in the five major components of reading -Capacity building of community school managers in instructional leadership and management -Provision learning materials, and engagement of community members to support learning outcomes-Mitigating of the impacts of HIV/AIDS on teacher and student populations through the provision of HIV/AIDS prevention messages linked to guidance and counseling support, as well as referrals to social service providers -Scholarship Provision to orphans and vulnerable children for school fees, resources, and academic/psychosocial support to help students successfully completes their secondary education-Development of a transition strategy for local ownership and sustainability of interventions with the ministry of education
